page.title: 17SAILING SCHOOLS
page.content:
{Rockley Point Sailing School
At{Rockley Point Sailing School,}they teach{sailing, windsurfing and {canoeing. }Their sailing boats are Optimists, Toppers, Wayfarers, Kestrels, 420s, ELs and Lasers. They teach from{Easter to October}and cater for 8 year old children to adults. The school has been running for 10 years and they have many foreign students. The courses cost about Â£100 per week. The Sailing School has up to 40 staff in the Summer and between 8 and 9 in the Winter. There are rescue boats but they have accidents only occasionally, mostly cuts and grazes.
